line_1: And, what is worse — my tresses all uncurl'd.
line_2: Like a small skiff my little bark was hurl'd,

line_1: And, what is worse — my tresses all uncurl'd.
line_2: Toss'd to and fro amidst a laughing world;

line_1: Thy Cheek all on Fire, and Thy Hair all uncurl'd:
line_2: Let Us e'en talk a little like Folks of This World.

line_1: With look serene, and brow uncurl'd,
line_2: Cry out, A — for all the world!
